device.noCameraInfo: No webcam was detected. Please ensure it is plugged into your device.
device.cameraHasUsed: The webcam was found but is in use by another application. Please close other programs using the webcam and try again.

settings.bindGoogle: Link to my Google Drive account

settings.backupAccountTip: Select a cloud provider to backup your settings
settings.restoreErrorTip: An error occurred while restoring settings from the cloud. Please try again
settings.backupErrorTip: An error occurred while backing up settings to the cloud. Please try again
settings.unbindGoogle: Remove link from your Google account
settings.unbindOneDrive: Remove link from your OneDrive account
settings.unbindGoogleTip: You will no longer be able to save your settings to your Google account.
settings.unbindOneDriveTip: You will no longer be able to save your settings to your OneDrive account.
settings.updateSuccess: The latest version of Kensington Konnect™ is downloading.
settings.updateError: An error occurred while downloading the latest version of Kensington Konnect™. Please try again

preset.name: Name
preset.editPresetMode: Edit a template name, or delete one
preset.editTips: Templates currently in use can not be deleted
preset.saveAdjustments: Save adjustments to a virtual camera template
preset.saveTips: Click on a template to select it

useGuide.pageContent1: Ensure your Kensington webcam is connected to your device. Once connected, select it within the “Device” tab.
useGuide.pageTitle2: Set your Ratio and Focal Area
useGuide.pageContent2: Next, use the “Ratio” tab to select a crop setting (ex: 16:9 for Teams, Zoom, and more). This tab also allows you to zoom in to set your desired focal area. Click ‘Apply’ to save your adjustments.
useGuide.pageContent3: Customize your virtual camera template with the “Effects” tab. Use the “Adjust” tab to dial in your preferences further.
useGuide.pageContent4: Once your preferences are set, click the “Save” button to add a new profile. Multiple profiles can be created for different use cases (Day, Night, Home, Work and more).
useGuide.pageContent5: Finally, within your meeting software (Teams, Zoom, and more) select “Kensington Konnect Virtual Camera” as your 'Source'. You are now ready to look your best in any environment!
